city for a several week period the outstanding world figures in
Medicine, many of whose views and experiences would have provided
outstandingly fine television fare for the six state region.
High points of such yearly meetings as the National Farm InstiÂ¬
tute could be shared with all of the states. In a like manner,
the great number of Community Lecture and Concert series which
bring local areas the most distinguished world visitors, point
to still further program resources.
The foregoing examples of program resources from the
community represent only a bare indication of the potential.
It seems that, as in viewing other program resources in the
six states, the problem would not be one of searching but
selection.
